name: Salesforce Embedded Survey Example
description: An example of using Surveys in an iframe on a 3rd party website

BG_FAKE.description: The URL for the Fake website background for demoing from a Desktop or Tablet

SURVEY_URL.description: The URL for the Survey Invitation [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT is set to NO]

BUTTON_CLASS.description: The Bootstrap class for th button color - Choose from btn-primary btn-secondary btn-success btn-warning btn-success btn-danger btn-warning btn-info btn-light btn-dark btn-link

BUTTON_TEXT.description: The label for the Floating Feedback Button

PRIVATE_KEY.description: The Private KEY for the Ceritifcate used in the Connected App [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT = YES]

LOGIN_URL.description: The URL for the Salesforce org [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT = YES]

USERNAME.description: The user name of the Salesforce integration user [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT = YES]

CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer Key from the Connected App [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT = YES]

SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT.description: Is the Survey related to a Contact (YES or NO)? If not the Survey URL is required.

CONTACT_ID.description: The Id of the Contact Record to which the Feedback must be related [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT = YES]

MODAL_HEIGHT.description: The height of the Feedback Modal

IFRAME_HEIGHT.description: The height of the Iframe within the Modal (recommended to be -50 of MODAL HEIGHT)

SURVEY_ID.description: The Id of the Survey for which an individual survey link has to be generated [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT = YES]

COMMUNITY_ID.description: The Id of the Community to which the individual survey link will be tied to [REQUIRED if SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT = YES]

BG_FAKE_MOBILE.description: The URL for the Fake website background if demoing from a Smart Phone
